title: You're Mine, Valentine
description: Valentine is finally going to meet her long-time crush, Maccallum Day. If she can somehow get past her shyness, she’s going to convince Mac that if she can’t be his forever-mate, she can at least be his weekend mistress.Wolf shifter, Mac, has been waiting for the Goddess to send his mate, but he’s growing impatient. After fifty years of celibacy, he is more than ready to meet the one woman that is his perfect match. In the meantime, he’s finding it harder and harder to stop thinking about Valentine White. Although he knows nothing more of her than what she has revealed in work emails, he can’t stop fantasizing about things that could never be.When Valentine and Mac meet, they realize there is more to their connection than the sweet emails they exchanged.Warning: this shifter novelette is fast and hot. If you are into dominant alpha males with a dirty side, and you’re a sucker for a sweet kismet romance, then come on in!
author: Paige Hammonds
